name: Places to see
description: Add some of you favourite place here so that other can check out. This site uses Firebase Auth to allow users to add a new place. Users can edit or delete only the places which they have added. Any user can view the places added to this site.
tech: NextJs, React.js, TypeScript, Hooks, TailwindCss, Prisma, PostgreSQL, TypeGraphQL, Apollo Client, Apollo Server, Firebase Auth, Mapbox, Google Places, Cloudinary, Vercel

name: Weather App
description: Search your location and get current weather with hourly & daily forecast.

name: Portfolio
tech: NextJs, React.js, Hooks, TailwindCss, Framer Motion
